# MAImageCaptioningCopyMetadataTagPath()

**Function**

Returns the metadata tag path.

## Declaration

```swift
func MAImageCaptioningCopyMetadataTagPath() -> CFString
```

## Image captioning settings

- **MAImageCaptioningCopyCaption(_:_:)**: Returns an accessibility caption from an image’s metadata.
- **MAImageCaptioningSetCaption(_:_:_:)**: Sets the accessibility caption for an image’s metadata.

items.description: Returns an accessibility caption from an image’s metadata.
items.name: MAImageCaptioningCopyCaption(_:_:)

items.description: Sets the accessibility caption for an image’s metadata.
